"use strict";
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
const csharp_1 = require("csharp");
const VectorTools_1 = require("../../utils/VectorTools");
//plane
class PlaneExpand {
    constructor() {
        this._normalVec = VectorTools_1.default.createVec3();
    }
    initWith3P(v1, v2, v3) {
        var p1 = csharp_1.GameUtils.ViewExtensionMethods.initVec3(v1.x, v1.y, v1.z);
        var p2 = csharp_1.GameUtils.ViewExtensionMethods.initVec3(v2.x, v2.y, v2.z);
        var p3 = csharp_1.GameUtils.ViewExtensionMethods.initVec3(v3.x, v3.y, v3.z);
        this.__comp = new csharp_1.UnityEngine.Plane(p1, p2, p3);
        var normal = this.__comp.normal;
        VectorTools_1.default.cloneTo(normal, this._normalVec);
    }
    get normal() {
        return this._normalVec;
    }
    get distance() {
        return this.__comp.distance;
    }
}
exports.default = PlaneExpand;
